isis.stitle: FRONT DRIVE AXLE WHEEL ENDS: FABCO SDA-12 - REASSEMBLY - WHEEL HUB INSTALLATION

step1.para: Assemble the wheel bearing cups and the outer axle shaft drive studs to the wheel hub.
On disc style wheel hubs, if wheel studs were removed:
Press wheel studs into place. Left hand thread studs go into the left hub, right hand thread studs into the right hub.
Assemble the brake drum to the cast spoke hub if separated. Secure with bolts, washers, and nuts. Tighten bolts to correct torque. Install the rim studs to cast spoke hub.
Pack the inner wheel bearing cone with the proper lubricant and insert into the wheel hub. Refer to LUBRICATION.
Coat the outside circumference of the wheel hub seal with Loctite Sleeve N' Bearing Mount #609 (green) and press into the hub.
Pack the cavity between the inner and outer wheel bearing to the level of the small diameter of the bearing cups.
Position the wheel hub or cast spoke hub and drum carefully over the spindle brake and spindle yoke assembly. Rotate the hub while positioning over spindle.
Pack the outer wheel bearing and install over the spindle. Refer to LUBRICATION.
Install the wheel bearing adjusting nut ( Figure 18) with dowel, if used, dowel facing outward (or up).
Adjust the wheel bearings as outlined in ADJUSTMENTS, WHEEL BEARINGS.
